subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Newsday writer Paul Moran, who died of lung cancer in November, instructed that his remains be scattered in the infield at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: The Newsday writer Paul Moran, who died of lung cancer in November, instructed that his remains be scattered in the infield at Saratoga Race Course.
